## Results

## Descriptive statistics table


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
Table: Descriptive statistics of the metabolites.

|Metabolite               |Mean (SD)    |
|:------------------------|:------------|
|CDCl3 (solvent)          |180 (67)     |
|Cholesterol              |18.6 (11.4)  |
|FA -CH2CH2COO-           |33.6 (7.8)   |
|Lipid -CH2-              |536.6 (61.9) |
|Lipid CH3- 1             |98.3 (73.8)  |
|Lipid CH3- 2             |168.2 (29.2) |
|MUFA+PUFA                |32.9 (16.1)  |
|PUFA                     |30 (24.1)    |
|Phosphatidycholine       |31.7 (20.5)  |
|Phosphatidylethanolamine |10 (7.6)     |
|Phospholipids            |2.7 (2.6)    |
|TMS (interntal standard) |123 (130.4)  |
:::
:::

## Running multiple models


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
Table: Metabolite outcome associations

|metabolite               |   estimate|    std.error|  statistic|   p.value|
|:------------------------|----------:|------------:|----------:|---------:|
|TMS (interntal standard) |  0.0561975| 9.898652e-01| -2.9083580| 0.0036333|
|CDCl3 (solvent)          |  0.0869604| 8.649502e-01| -2.8236342| 0.0047483|
|Lipid CH3- 1             | 44.4730379| 1.406299e+00|  2.6984901| 0.0069655|
|Phosphatidylethanolamine | 26.8810059| 1.323904e+00|  2.4861474| 0.0129134|
|Cholesterol              |  2.9682992| 4.578064e-01|  2.3765265| 0.0174765|
|PUFA                     |  3.2688029| 5.602082e-01|  2.1142565| 0.0344934|
|Lipid -CH2-              |  0.0025921| 3.138898e+00| -1.8972514| 0.0577948|
|MUFA+PUFA                |  0.4555963| 4.487599e-01| -1.7518235| 0.0798042|
|FA -CH2CH2COO-           |  1.5241884| 3.871097e-01|  1.0887409| 0.2762682|
|Lipid CH3- 2             |  0.8848907| 3.605017e-01| -0.3392247| 0.7344405|
|Phosphatidycholine       |  0.0000000| 1.166281e+05| -0.0023670| 0.9981114|
|Phospholipids            |  0.0000000| 6.896422e+04| -0.0006217| 0.9995039|
